abstract: <jats:p>The checklist of European Gelechiidae covers 865 species, belonging to 109 genera, with three species records which require confirmation. Further, it is the first checklist to include a complete coverage of proved synonyms of species and at generic level. The following taxonomic changes are introduced:<jats:italic>Pseudosophronia constanti</jats:italic>(Nel, 1998)<jats:bold>syn. nov.</jats:bold>of<jats:italic>Pseudosophronia exustellus</jats:italic>(Zeller, 1847),<jats:italic>Metzneria expositoi</jats:italic>Vives, 2001<jats:bold>syn. nov.</jats:bold>of<jats:italic>Metzneria aestivella</jats:italic>(Zeller, 1839);<jats:italic>Sophronia ascalis</jats:italic>Gozmány, 1951<jats:bold>syn. nov.</jats:bold>of<jats:italic>Sophronia grandii</jats:italic>Hering, 1933,<jats:italic>Aproaerema incognitana</jats:italic>(Gozmány, 1957)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema cinctelloides</jats:italic>(Nel &amp; Varenne, 2012)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema azosterella</jats:italic>(Herrich-Schäffer, 1854)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema montanata</jats:italic>(Gozmány, 1957)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema cincticulella</jats:italic>(Bruand, 1851)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema buvati</jats:italic>(Nel, 1995)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema linella</jats:italic>(Chrétien, 1904)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema captivella</jats:italic>(Herrich-Schäffer, 1854)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema semicostella</jats:italic>(Staudinger, 1871)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema steppicola</jats:italic>(Junnilainen, 2010)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema cottienella</jats:italic>(Nel, 2012)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Ptocheuusa cinerella</jats:italic>(Chrétien, 1908)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Pragmatodes melagonella</jats:italic>(Constant, 1895)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Pragmatodes albagonella</jats:italic>(Varenne &amp; Nel, 2010)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Pragmatodes parvulata</jats:italic>(Gozmány, 1953)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx nigromaculella</jats:italic>(Millière, 1872)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx wilkella</jats:italic>(Linnaeus, 1758)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx ochricapilla</jats:italic>(Rebel, 1903)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx superbella</jats:italic>(Zeller, 1839)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx mirusella</jats:italic>(Huemer &amp; Karsholt, 2013)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx baldizzonei</jats:italic>(Karsholt &amp; Huemer, 2013)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx occidentella</jats:italic>(Huemer &amp; Karsholt, 2011)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx libertinella</jats:italic>(Zeller, 1872)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx gemerensis</jats:italic>(Elsner, 2013)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx deserta</jats:italic>(Piskunov, 1990)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx unicolorella</jats:italic>(Duponchel, 1843)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx nigritella</jats:italic>(Zeller, 1847)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx plumbella</jats:italic>(Heinemann, 1870)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx isostacta</jats:italic>(Meyrick, 1926)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx helotella</jats:italic>(Staudinger, 1859)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx parahelotella</jats:italic>(Nel, 1995)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Oxypteryx graecatella</jats:italic>(Šumpich &amp; Skyva, 2012)<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Aproaerema genistae</jats:italic>(Walsingham, 1908)<jats:bold>comb. rev.</jats:bold>,<jats:italic>Aproaerema thaumalea</jats:italic>(Walsingham, 1905)<jats:bold>comb. rev.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Dichomeris neatodes</jats:italic>Meyrick, 1923<jats:bold>sp. rev.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Caryocolum horoscopa</jats:italic>(Meyrick, 1926)<jats:bold>stat. rev.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Ivanauskiella occitanica</jats:italic>(Nel &amp; Varenne, 2013)<jats:bold>sp. rev.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Apodia martinii</jats:italic>Petry, 1911<jats:bold>sp. rev.</jats:bold>;<jats:italic>Caulastrocecis cryptoxena</jats:italic>(Gozmány, 1952)<jats:bold>sp. rev.</jats:bold>Following Article 23.9.2 ICZN we propose<jats:italic>Caryocolum blandella</jats:italic>(Douglas, 1852) (<jats:italic>Gelechia</jats:italic>)<jats:bold>nom. protectum</jats:bold>and<jats:italic>Caryocolum signatella</jats:italic>(Eversmann, 1844) (<jats:italic>Lita</jats:italic>)<jats:bold>nom. oblitum.</jats:bold></jats:p>
